summary: Implements a model that wraps the Tesseract OCR command‑line utility, exposing a callable interface that runs Tesseract on image data, captures its output, and converts the results into the library’s OCR data structures for downstream document processing.
business_intent: Provide a reliable, configurable OCR component for the document conversion platform, allowing automated extraction of searchable text and layout information from scanned images using the widely‑available Tesserent engine.
